name: Discharge (itch) (MegaProgramGuy)
description:
Discharge is a multi-stage aerobic capacity test that progressively gets more difficult as it continues (sorry, wrong script lol)

Discharge is a grid-based puzzle game about a battery made in one week for the Three-button Game Jam on itch.io with the theme "cycles." I took inspiration from the charge cycle of a battery, which is a property which describes the battery life. Here is the link to the Wikipedia page for charge cycles: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charge_cycle

Most of the instructions are in-game, but here is a list of all of the interactable tiles and their functions:

• Lime-green dots: Recharges your battery to full capacity.

• Two vertical lines: takes away one charge point and opens a door.

• Zig-zag line with dark green dots: transfers your battery power to and from an energy tank (dark blue dots)

• Red X: Fully drains your battery.

Press R to restart the level if you get stuck.

CREDITS:

• All art and code made by me within the seven-day timeframe.

• Sound effects made by me using bfxr.

• Song is "Electric Winds" by Lumitrap on beepbox.co.

• Retro Indie Josh for hosting the jam!
